issues.title: Healthcare Reform
issues.description: Opposes Affordable Care Act, supports free-market healthcare solutions and reduced government involvement

issues.title: Libertarian Economic Policy
issues.description: Advocates for significant tax cuts, reduced government spending, and minimal economic regulation

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Supports stricter border control, opposes comprehensive immigration reform, advocates for merit-based immigration

issues.title: Foreign Policy Non-Interventionism
issues.description: Opposes military interventions, supports reducing foreign aid, advocates for limited international engagement

issues.title: Second Amendment Rights
issues.description: Strong supporter of gun ownership rights, opposes gun control legislation

issues.title: Government Surveillance Reduction
issues.description: Advocates for limiting government surveillance powers, supports privacy protections

issues.title: Federal Reserve Oversight
issues.description: Supports auditing the Federal Reserve, advocates for monetary policy transparency

issues.title: Environmental Deregulation
issues.description: Opposes excessive environmental regulations, supports free-market environmental solutions
